Package bg.tu_varna.sit.a1.f22621621.models

Class Grammar

java.lang.Object
bg.tu_varna.sit.a1.f22621621.models.Grammar
public class Grammar extends Object
The type Grammar. It's one of the main elements of the application and is defined by an ID and a Set of Rules.

    • print

      public void print()
      Prints the Grammar.

    • save

      public void save(String fileName)
      Saves a Grammar in a file. Creates a StringBuilder that contains the String representation of the Grammar and writes it in the file using a PrintWriter. A FileNotFoundException is caught in case the method doesn't find the file.
      Parameters:
      fileName - the file name

    • addRule

      public void addRule(String rule)
      Adds a Rule to the Grammar. Takes a String that contains a Rule and transforms it into a Rule object and then tries adding it to the Rule Set of the Grammar.
      Parameters:
      rule - the String that contains the Rule

    • removeRule

      public void removeRule(int number) throws InvalidRuleNumberException
      Removes a Rule from the Grammar. It iterates over each rule and increments a counter. After finding the number it removes the current rule that the iterator is on. If the number is negative or larger than the amount of Rules in the Grammar it throws an exception and displays an error message.
      Parameters:
      number - the number of the Rule to be removed
      Throws:
      InvalidRuleNumberException - if the number cannot be an index of a Rule

    • generateUniqueID

      public static long generateUniqueID()
      Generates a unique ID for the Grammar of type long using Random and AtomicLong.
      Returns:
      long - the unique ID

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Creates a String representation of the Grammar that contains all Rules of the Grammar.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      String - representation of the Grammar
